etymology.interpretation: Proper-noun compound naming the historic commercial street in Dadaocheng, Taipei. The post-1945 name likely commemorates 迪化 (now Ürümqi), while the morphemes 迪 ‘guide’ and 化 ‘transform’ give an auspicious tone.

examples.chinese: 我们去迪化街逛年货市集(我們去迪化街逛年貨市集)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen qù Díhuà Jiē guàng niánhuò shìjí.
examples.english: We’re going to Dihua Street to browse the Lunar New Year market.

examples.chinese: 迪化街位于台北大同区(迪化街位於台北大同區)，是历史商街(是歷史商街)。
examples.pinyin: Díhuà Jiē wèi yú Táiběi Dàtóng Qū, shì lìshǐ shāngjiē.
examples.english: Dihua Street is located in Datong District, Taipei; it is a historic commercial street.

examples.chinese: 许多老店在迪化街传承百年(許多老店在迪化街傳承百年)。
examples.pinyin: Xǔduō lǎodiàn zài Díhuà Jiē chuánchéng bǎinián.
examples.english: Many old shops on Dihua Street have been passed down for a century.
